topic.fullpath: Topic :: Multimedia :: Graphics :: Capture :: Digital Camera

name: JIV-Java interface for video devices
short_description: Jcam captures and saves JPEGs  and Video from your webcam, manually or automatically. It works on Linux and Windows, for cameras with drivers compatible with v4l or vfw.  It uses Java(1.3.1), Swing and Blackdown/Sun JMF2.1.1 respectively.
